rooms.description: Provides a welcoming entrance with natural light from the West-facing facade.
Spacious open-plan area merging living space and dining area with ample windows to capture natural light. The design includes Art Deco geometric patterns on the ceiling.
Fully integrated into the open-plan space; designed with efficient workflow and large windows for ventilation.
Quiet retreat featuring north-east facing window per Vastu principles. Decorated in Art Deco style with rich colors and geometric detailing.
Compact bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom for convenience.

openings.description: Large windows providing ample natural light and ensuring proper ventilation. The openings are designed in line with Vastu for prosperity.
Stylish Art Deco door that complements the overall aesthetic.
Outdoor swimming pool with a tiled surround, designed for relaxation and social gatherings. The placement is chosen based on Vastu guidelines.
Provides an additional outdoor space with natural lighting and ventilation.

vastu_considerations: Natural light and ventilation are maximized by placing windows on the West wall.
Master Bedroom oriented towards north-east for positive energy flow.
Swimming pool placed in a manner that balances space while adhering to Vastu.
additional_details.notes: The design seamlessly integrates an open-plan living area with a separate kitchen, promoting fluidity and interaction between spaces. Exterior elements are designed to enhance the Art Deco aesthetics while maintaining functionality and comfort according to local building norms.
